version_description:
Fixing a few issues that popped up after the release of iOS 8. Special thanks to all of the Geniuses who reported the FAIL :)

NEW THIS UPDATE:
- iOS 8 Compatibility & Enhancements
- Support for larger iPhone screens
- Bug Fixes

- Brand-new look with support for iOS9.
- Unlimited retries!
- Still stuck on a question? Use some golden apples to get the answer!

- Invite your friends via Facebook or Text Message!
- A couple small tweaks & bug fixes

- A couple small tweaks & bug fixes
- iOS 9.3 support
- A couple small tweaks & bug fixes
- A couple small tweaks & bug fixes
- A couple small tweaks & bug fixes
Happy Thanksgiving! Food Fight is unlocked for a limited time.
Happy Thanksgiving! Food Fight is unlocked for a limited time.
Winter Break is unlocked for a limited time. Happy Holidays!

- Winter Break is unlocked for a limited time. Happy Holidays!
- Stuck on a question? Try "Ask a Friend"!
Just a little spring cleaning! (A couple small tweaks & bug fixes)
Level 5: Skip Day is unlocked for a limited time!
Winter Break is unlocked for the holidays!
Just a little spring cleaning! (A couple small tweaks & bug fixes)

Updated some questions!
Support for new iPhone & iPad devices!
Winter Break is unlocked for the holidays!

Updated some questions!
Support for new iPhone & iPad devices!

Say hello the 1st release of The Moron Test in 2020:
* Try your hand at solving the puzzles. Its simpler than it looks but still tricky!
* Play various other packs for puzzles of different types for a change
* Use apples to get hints when its needed.
* Restore functionality added to allow players to restore prior purchases!
Thank you for all of your wonderful support! Keep sending us your feedback so we can improve The Moron Test even more!

Say hello the next release of The Moron Test:
* Try your hand at solving the puzzles. Its simpler than it looks but still tricky!
* Play various other packs for puzzles of different types for a change!
* Spread the joy and share the puzzles with others for help!
* Climb our leaderboard for bragging rights!
Thank you for your wonderful support! Keep sending us your feedback so we can improve The Moron Test even more!

The latest version of TMT brings to players the following goodies:
* 2 new puzzle packs: Superhero & Refresher Pack
* New achievements added for our 2 new packs!
* Launch of our first TMT event: Take part in it to access new puzzles for a limited time
* Optimizations to make the game run smoother!
Thank you for your support and let us know how we can improve the game further!

Say hello the next release of The Moron Test:
* 2 new puzzle packs have been added: Recess Time & Field Trip!
* Recess Time: Distribute food to the various characters in TMT. Note their preferences and help the students get their previous food!
* Field Trip: The students are scheduled for a field trip to several places. Complete tasks and return them safely back!
* New achievements added for Recess Time & Field Trip Packs!
Thank you for your wonderful support! Keep sending us your feedback so we can improve The Moron Test even more!
